Game.CREATE: You do not have permission to create a new game. Only users that are administrators in one or more organizations can create new games.
Game.UPDATE: You do not have permission to update "{game}". Only "{organization}" administrators can update this game.
Game.DELETE: You do not have permission to delete "{game}". Only "{organization}" administrators can delete this game.

Organization.CREATE: You do not have permission to create a new organization.
Organization.UPDATE: You do not have permission to update "{organization}". Only administrators of this organization can update it.
Organization.DELETE: You do not have permission to delete "{organization}". This organization can be deleted only by its owner.

Account.DELETE: You do not have permission to deactivate this account. This account can only be deactivate by its owner: "{owner}".
